# AVAudioSession.RecordPermission.denied

**Case**

A value that indicates that the user has denied recording permission.

## Declaration

```swift
case denied
```

## Record Permissions

- **AVAudioSession.RecordPermission.undetermined**: A value that indicates that the user hasn’t granted or denied recording permission.
- **AVAudioSession.RecordPermission.granted**: A value that indicates that the user has granted recording permission.

items.description: A value that indicates that the user hasn’t granted or denied recording permission.
